## Show Leaflet map

```{r, eval=T, echo=FALSE, comment=""}
library (leaflet)

df_cities = data.frame(name = c("Sorocaba","Votorantim","Itu","Piedade","Pilar"),
                       pop = c(644919,117794,167095,54717,28309), lat = c(-23.5015,
                       -23.50403, -23.2640, -23.7289, -23.8103), 
                       lon = c(-47.4526, -47.4446,-47.2997, -47.4336, -47.7239))
df_cities %>% leaflet () %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addCircles(weight = 5, radius = sqrt(df_cities$pop) * 20)

```
